title: Will the Redmi Note 5 Pro last for at least 2-3 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are asking that Redmi note 5 pro will last for 2-3 years with the same performance, the answer is both yes or no. It depends on the manufacturers to optimise the phone. If xiaomi offers regular software & OS updates, then yes it will last for 2-3 years without losing much performance. The bad thing is xiaomi takes too much time to provide OS upgrade to their smartphones. The reason is xiaomi phones run on heavily customised MIUI android based ROM that's why xiaomi users receive android upgrades quite late. However, Xiaomi regularly sends software updates to fix bugs and for system optimization through OTA. So use it for next 3 years without worry as Redmi note 5 pro has already powerful enough hardware to give you a smooth performance. Some tech bloggers and YouTubers who review mobiles might have different opinions, but don't just buy or sell your phone frequently just a tech youtube tells you to upgrade your phone with new one. Every day a new phone launch with a few new features, and hardware upgradation. Buying a new smartphone just for some new features is not worth unless you really need that features in your phone. Anything can last long as long as you keep and use them carefully just like a mother care for her babies.
